item.title: AQL Inspection System
item.description: What is AQL Inspection System? AQL Inspection System to Merchandisers AQL stands for Acceptable Quality Level. AQL is an internationally recognized standard for inspection. It determines the number of samples to be picked and inspected randomly and the maximum defect quantity allowed in order to pass the inspection. Here is an example: Step 1: First to get customer quality requirement **Step 2 : Check AQL table 1 to get batch size
